title: Requirement of LOS as per the provisions of Regulation No
clause_text: Requirement of LOS as per the provisions of Regulation No.27 on AH plot and Govt./Semi-Govt./Appropriate Authority’s share of land shall be 15%. Thus overall 25% cumulative LOS of entire holding shall be achieved by considering POS to be handed over to MCGM and owners share of land/AH plot.
